document_data.name: Summon monster IX
document_data.mainbody: '''''Summon monster IX''''' was the most powerful of a series of ''[[summon monster]]'' spells that called an [[outsider]] to fight for the caster.
document_data.Effect:
This spell functioned just as all ''summon monster'' spells. It could summon a [[couatl]], [[leonal]], or [[celestial creature|celestial]] [[roc]] from one of the [[celestial planes]]; an elder [[elemental]] from one of the [[Inner Planes]]; a [[green slaad]] from the plane of [[Limbo]]; or a [[hamatula]], [[fiendish creature|fiendish]] [[dire shark]], gargantuan fiendish [[monstrous scorpion]], [[night hag]], [[bebilith]], colossal fiendish [[monstrous spider]], or [[hezrou]] from one of the [[fiendish planes]]. or a [[farastu]] or [[Wastrilith]] from the Lower Planes.

Alternatively, it could summon one to three celestial [[dire bear]]s, celestial [[Sperm whale|cachalot whale]]s, celestial [[triceratops]], or [[lillend]]s from the Upper Planes; one to three greater elementals from the Inner Planes; one to three [[blue slaad]]i from Limbo; or the same number of fiendish [[giant squid]]s, [[hellcat]]s, colossal fiendish [[monstrous centipede]]s, fiendish [[dire tiger]]s, gargantuan fiendish monstrous spiders, fiendish [[tyrannosaurus]], or [[vrock]]s from the Lower Planes.

Finally, it could summon from two to five creatures that weaker ''summon monster'' spells could conjure.

Multiple creatures summoned had to be within 30 feet of each other.
